message.content:
cs.CG, cs.DS, cs.GT, cs.DM, cs.SY. 

The paper deals with the combinatorial complexity of the zone of the boundary of a convex set in an arrangement of hyperplanes, which is a fundamental problem in computational geometry. Therefore, cs.CG (Computational Geometry) is the most likely sub-category. The paper also involves the analysis of the complexity of the outer part of the zone, which suggests that it may be relevant to cs.DS (Data Structures and Algorithms). The use of combinatorial arguments and geometric techniques may also make it relevant to cs.GT (Computer Science and Game Theory) and cs.DM (Discrete Mathematics). Finally, the mention of an open question related to the complexity of the inner part of the zone suggests that the paper may also be relevant to cs.SY (Systems and Control).
